text: The Georgia House of Representatives is the lower house of the Georgia General Assembly (the state legislature) of the U.S. state of Georgia. There are currently 180 elected members. The Georgia House of Representatives was created in 1777 during the American Revolution.The Capitalization of Georgia , Georgia State Government . title: Georgia House of Representatives
